claims.claim: Interest in technology can significantly impact one's ability to adapt upon reentry.
claims.quote: I'm one of those folks that was like really fortunate in that I understood technology in the ways that a lot of my, like contemporaries didn't

claims.claim: Access to informational resources like encyclopedias can foster a lifelong interest in learning.
claims.quote: my parents cared enough about me and my interest that they had got me like this encyclopedia set

claims.claim: Socioeconomic status limits opportunities to explore and learn through hands-on experiences.
claims.quote: even when you have the idea, you don't necessarily have the ability to even, tinker with stuff yourself because of socioeconomic issues

claims.claim: Incarcerated individuals can maintain connection with technological advancements through personal interest and effort.
claims.quote: Science was always my thing. And so when I was incarcerated, I was a person that science digest and sci-fi news that was the stuff like I, that would, would be some things I would do for my own personal interest

claims.claim: The inability to experiment with technology due to financial constraints hinders learning and exploration.
claims.quote: if your parents went and broke they back and sweat to get you this video game system, you bet not break that thing apart... because of socioeconomic issues
